#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Start a Sleep Spa
#Text=A Sleep
#Text=Spa is a place you can create with little or no capital .
#Text=It is not a business but a mindset .
#Text=It is a place for your client to feel comfortable , happy , and calm .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Get an Apartment .
#Text=If you are sleeping under a bridge that 's ok , just be aware that you may not be ready to start a world class Sleep Spa .
#Text=First you 're going to need a clean and comfortable apartment in a pretty nice neighborhood .
#Text=You do n't want your client to have to fight criminals or wolves on the way to your doorstep .
#Text=Get some amenities .
#Text=Its important to have a way to differentiate yourself from other Sleep Spas .
#Text=That 's the surest way to attract high quality clientele .
#Text=Clients like things like sleep masks , clean sheets , cooling fans , warm furnaces , and pleasing lighting schematics .
#Text=Definitely make sure you have these and once your operation is underway start to add new features as frequently as possible .
#Text=Some of the most notable full service Sleep Spas offer personal chefs , chauffeurs , and in-house physical therapists .
#Text=Building a Sleep Spa from the ground up can be daunting but its important to remember that new amenities and features can be added slowly over time .
#Text=Pick a a motto .
#Text=You may consider focusing on the sleep experience when creating a tag line for your Sleep Spa .
#Text=A motto like " The Sleep Spa , where everybody gets nine hours " is a great way to market and draw attention to your budding business .
#Text=Get a client .
#Text=A Sleep Spa is just an apartment without a lovely client to bring your services to life .
#Text=Clients come in many shapes and forms , but keep in mind that the best Sleep Spas cater to only one client at a time so make sure you chose your client wisely !
#Text=Continue to provide world renowned sleep services .
#Text=A Sleep Spa is live-changing undertaking .
#Text=As many small business owners say , you will have to work 24/7 when you are operating a Sleep Spa , but at least you can pick the days and the hours !
#Text=Tips
#Text=Do n't overbook your Sleep Spa .
#Text=It 's ok to have more than one guest at the Spa on occasion , but keep this to a minimum .
#Text=When running a Sleep Spa , your product is a luxury experience .
#Text=You do n't want to diminish this by creating a Youth Hostel .
#Text=If you are eventually considering turning your Sleep Spa into a franchise , consider reinvesting all of your dividends for rapid grow .
#Text=Make sure to ask your client for constant feedback about the climate , conditions , and amenities at your Sleep Spa .
#Text=She will have definite ideas and preferences and this is an invaluable guide while you are starting out .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Remember to let your client get at least 9 hours of sleep !
